ModMetaData.name: Amrita - Age Reversing Serum - Remastered

ModMetaData.description:
Adds a research project, and items to halt or reverse a pawn's biological aging.

ORIGINAL MOD: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2349377017
